settingssettings.header: What kind of settings did you expect?
settingssettings.paragraph: It is literally just a game about ads. What else do you want, a settings empire?I added the narrator speed slider because our site tester was aging rapidly while waiting for the lines tofinish. Then I threw in a language selector because i simply can. But making these settings apply to the whole site? Yeah, no. I am way too lazy for that.So that's all you get. Enjoy!

hints.1-thankyou: I suppose you click by mistake. Anyway...
hints.2-betterad: I mean... Maybe you are dumber than i expected?
hints.3-why: Why indeed. Maybe just move on?
hints.4-feedback: Your opinion matters... at all. Have you tried being honest?
hints.5-timeout: Patience dude patience... Patience is the only savior.
hints.8-let-it-slide: As Ceaser said: I slide, you slide, the Ad slide.
hints.10-blackout: Search for buttons under the light.
hints.11-LICK-IT: Go and lick it for half a minute. Maybe something will occur...
hints.12-feed: Are you blind? Look carefully at the logout section. You may want to put some glasses on.
hints.13-gambling: Free gamble slot? In this era? Here we gooo. GAMBLE!
hints.14-cmd: Click on the middle of the Ad and delete it.
hints.default: Yes this is the hint button. Click me whenever you stuck.
